entry.def: A cosmology is a theory about the origin and nature of the universe.

example.ex: ...the ideas implicit in Big Bang cosmology.

entry.def: Cosmology is the study of the origin and nature of the universe.

means.word_mean: 1. an astronomer who studies the evolution and space-time relations of the universe
